label: TYPE
description: This field stores the addenda information type of (0) Standard. This is the only option for this field.

label: INFO:1
description: This field stores up to 40 characters of additional information about the parent EFT record.

label: INFO:2
description: This field stores up to 40 more characters of additional information about the parent EFT record.

label: RECORDCHANGEDATE
description: The system stores the system date this field when you create, change, or save the EFT Addenda Info record. There are times when the system updates this field because the record was saved, even though there may not be any actual changes in the record.

label: LOCATOR
description: The system stores a unique number within each member account in this field that can be used as a unique identification of this record.
